attributes.review: i was so excited to show our wonderful president the love and support that he deserves, so i downloaded this app to keep track of his growth! however, the second i downloaded it, an army of robots barged into my house and demanded i vote for trump 2020 😱we were terrified and before we could give them our unwavering support, they gave my entire family heart attacks. all 36 of my cousins died right on the spot, and i was the only survivor 😭 so traumatizing 😞i do not recommend this app!!
attributes.title: robots killed my family
